mapper.insert: INSERT INTO short_url ( short_code, department_name, creator_id, creator_type, note, created_at, updated_at, expires_at ) VALUES ( #{shortCode}, #{department}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorType}, #{note}, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), #{expiresAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT su.short_url_id, su.short_code, su.department_name, su.creator_id, su.creator_type, su.note, su.created_at AS su_created_at, su.updated_at AS su_updated_at, su.deleted_at AS su_deleted_at, su.expires_at, surr.redirect_rule_id, surr.short_url_id AS surr_short_url_id, surr.device_type, surr.target_url, surr.created_at AS surr_created_at, surr.updated_at AS surr_updated_at, surr.deleted_at AS surr_deleted_at FROM short_url su LEFT JOIN short_url_redirect_rule surr ON su.short_url_id = surr.short_url_id WHERE su.short_code = #{shortCode} AND su.deleted_at IS NULL
